ie.ucd.nearmiss

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.ucd.nearmiss.Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Obstacle, Plane, Sky

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract lass which describes movable objects in the game. Each game object will extend this class. It contains attributes that all game objects will require.
